Posts.Content: veggie4me wrote: I had a double mastectomy last year with no lymph node involvement. 3 months after finishing chemo, I found swollen lymph nodes bilaterally. After a biopsy, I was told the cancer had spread to both sides and started back in chemo. Now, I am scheduled next week to remove all the lymph nodes on both sides. Does anyone have suggestions for me as far as having a quick recovery from this, things to do or not do, etc.? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Lymph Node Removal Surgery - Any suggestions? veggie4me PinkFairy
